WorkItem.Description:
I expect it to scroll 7 lines per wheel "click", but it only scrolls 1 line at the moment.

The number of lines is available from System.Windows.Forms.SystemInformation.MouseWheelScrollLines

I think this is an easy change

Thanks for your efforts!

Cheers,
 Simon
WorkItem.Summary: Scroll wheel should use the "number of lines to scroll" from Windows Mouse settings
